QuestData.Title: The Trust You've Earned
QuestData.Description:
I believe my loa will agree with me when I say that you have proven yourself worthy of this one's companionship.
She is large enough now that she can bear you wherever it is that you wish to go.
I had de Beastlord craft a saddle for you. Go and get it and I will help you put it on your new steed's back.
Congratulations, $n.
QuestData.LogDescription: Retrieve the Direhorn Saddle in Warbeast Kraal.
